chithrapatiye palamu ardhaya gothami hewath aariyalathage hoda nohoda musuwu jiwithaya mathin sathurek bihikaradena nirmanakaruwaa deweni ardhaya thula yamthak durata sathurage paththa gannawa, palamuwa gothami noyeka dukkadonassayanta lak karawana nirmanakaru dewana ardhayedi desman nam pirimiyekuge sewane widaniwannata salasamin wipula athulu pathrawargayo mahath wu jiwitha wyasanayakata ada damayi.(ada ahimiwana de yali- heta depa mula radeyi, maharaja gamunu chithrapatiye githayak ) wipulage janelaya laga bagapathwana gothamita deweni ardhayedi thamage niwasema dora laga wipula rasthiyadukarana tharamata adhyakshakawaraya (a )karunika wana namudu eya asata asa leyata leya dakwa paliganimakata laghu nokarannata wagabala gani.
